comment.author: 62830967@N05
comment._content: This is the photograph of my parents Alfie and May Stinson who were married on 31st July 1946. From left to right: Mary White (bridesmaid). Billy Couser (brother of the bride). Mary Stinson nee Couser (bride). Alfie Stinson (groom). Lily Couser (sister of the bride). Reggie Stinson (brother of the groom)

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Thank you for adding these details, Mar-Lyn.
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland
